description: This Dart source file defines the HomeScreen widget for a Flutter notes app. It manages the app's main notes display, search functionality, navigation to note editing screens, and note deletion.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that serves as the main screen displaying notes. It includes search functionality, a grid view of notes, and navigation to note creation and editing screens.

classes.name: _HomeScreenState
classes.description: The state class managing the behavior and UI of HomeScreen, including initialization, disposing resources, and building the widget tree.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state, loads notes after the first frame.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of the search controller when the widget is removed.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI, including AppBar with search, body with notes grid or message, and floating action button.
